DOC.brief_summary: Intimate partner violence (IPV) against women have negative mental health consequences for survivors; interventions designed to improve survivors' depressive symptoms and health status are limited.Present study evaluate the effectiveness of an integrated intervention in reducing intimate partner violence (IPV) improving health status.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of an Integrated Intervention on Mental Health in Survivors of Intimate Partner Violence
DOC.criteria: Women over 18 For those who agreed to participate Given written consent Screening for abuse was positive Screened Negative serious mental condition including suicide, hallucination, Dementia Drug or substance abuse, alcoholism Pregnant
